description: within a circle woman and child seated at a round table; man standing next to child; drinking glass in man's hand and at child's mouth; rays of light around head of woman and child; halo around man's head
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

In plate in black: [Jac. Callot In.   et fec. Nancey/ EIA AGE CARE PUER, CALICEM BIBE, TE MANET ALTER/ QUI TENSIS MANIBUS NON NISI MORTE CADET/ Israel Sillvestre exc. cum privil. Regis.]  on mount in pencil: [Lieure 595]
title: Eia Age Care Puer, Calicem Bibe, Te Manet Alter
